author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger CLI: ready2use outputs
description: gamechanger-dapp-cli tool is able to generate URL and QR codes, but it doesn't provide ready-to-integrate snippets for HTML, react, node...
solution: We propose to extend current URL and QR code generation from GCScripts, with plain HTML, React and Nodejs snippets.
experience: We made GameChanger, a released and long term product, highly humanized and gamified wallet, committed to newcomers, students and builders.
